prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with elegant flowing fins and a serpentine body.
Design a dragon-type Pokemon that blends aquatic and mystical features seamlessly.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a shimmering blue body with yellow accents and dragon-like characteristics.
Generate a unique creature that resembles a sea horse, but with a powerful aquatic presence.
Make a Pokemon with delicate wings and a long tail, perfect for navigating underwater realms.
Show me a majestic water-dragon Pokemon that thrives in oceanic environments.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies both grace and strength, with vibrant colors and unique traits.
